A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you always wanted to see Luke Skywalker be a wimp\, Lea inexplicably become Superwoman\, and a rebel commander chastise a fighter pilot for losing a few bombers so she can sacrifice the entire rebel fleet before finally fighting back then this movie is for you.  If not I can sum it up the new Star Wars for you in one sentence. Men are weak and out of control and the universe would be better off without them.
